summary: This is an email chain from July 2020 discussing the filing of a detention memorandum related to Ghislaine Maxwell's case. The correspondence involves attorneys coordinating the formatting, signature block, and filing procedure for the memo, indicating it is to be filed in the Southern District of New York (SDNY) and a copy provided to a judge in the District of New Hampshire (DNH).
keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated July 1-2, 2020, concerning a detention memorandum for Ghislaine Maxwell (GM).
The memo is being prepared for filing in the Southern District of New York (SDNY) on the prosecution's docket.
A copy of the filed memo is to be provided by email to a judge in the District of New Hampshire (DNH).
The correspondence shows legal team coordination on procedural details like the signature block and defined terms (e.g., CBP).
The subject matter indicates ongoing pre-trial detention proceedings for Ghislaine Maxwell in mid-2020.
